description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis- Learn Hypnotic Imagination Games For Fun.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn 7 exciting games using your imagination and hypnosis for fun , fame and profit . You will learn many exciting games to impress people in social gatherings , parties and public performances.

This is a fun course in which you will learn-

  • What are the hypnotic imagination games?
  • How hypnotic imagination games can be fun and interesting games that attract people and make you the center of attraction in parties and functions.
You will also learn how it feels to be in the state of self hypnosis and how you can put anyone into the state of self hypnosis easily.This course is ideal for stage performers and public speakers as by using these techniques they can create a good impression and showcase their skills in publicIt is also very helpful for young hypnotists and magicians.This course is in English and contains more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 11 lectures This course contains -

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:First Hypnotic Imagination Game – Finger Magnet

Lecture3:Second Hypnotic Imagination Game – Hand Magnet

Lecture4:Third Hypnotic Imagination Game – The Balloon and a Dictionary

Lecture5:Fourth Hypnotic Imagination Game – Hand Lock

Lecture6:Fifth Hypnotic Imagination Game – Arm Stiffening

Lecture7:Sixth Hypnotic Imagination Game – Postural Sway

Lecture8:Seventh Hypnotic Imagination Game – Pendulum Lecture9:Summary

Lecture 10:Recap On How To Use Hypnotic Games- E-BOOK

Lecture 11:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis
title: Hypnosis- Learn Hypnotic Imagination Games For Fun
